turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a random milkshake with the toppings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say a milkshake?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it doesn't look like peet's has milkshakes, can i suggest some coffees?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, fine. I need a cold coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk with your iced coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With extra honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok ill make sure to add honey, did you want any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: im sorry can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, was that whole milk or skim milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can't get it. Can you tell me for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure ill give you the milk options, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is non-fat, 2%, whole milk, soy milk, or almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, ill add the soy milk for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want your coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, show.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a large iced coffee with extra honey and soy milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'll go try it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pickup at peet's coffee at 4598 el camino real, palo alto, ca in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
